articles.title: Mark Zuckerberg: Threads users down by more than a half - BBC
articles.description: The rival to Twitter saw explosive growth but users have since drifted away, Meta boss acknowledges.
articles.content:
Meta boss Mark Zuckerberg says its new social media platform, Threads, has lost more than half its users.
The Twitter rival rocketed to more than 100 million users within five days of its launch ear… [+2090 chars]
